units.title: Isolation, preculture, and differentiation of LGR5+ intestinal stem cells
units.text: Single LGR5+ intestinal stem cells were isolated via FACS and precultured for 3 days under stem cell maintenance conditions (day 0 seeding, ENR CV days 0–3). On day 3, CV was removed from the culture, and organoids differentiated under ENR conditions for up to 3 days. For each day during development (S0–S3), individual organoids were isolated, dissociated and processed on the DisCo platform.
units.rationale: Describes the stepwise handling of stem cells from isolation to processing for analysis.

units.title: Single organoid workflow steps
units.text: 1. FACS sort 4. Dissociate LGR5+ cells CV 5. Process cells 2. Seed cells 3. Preculture
units.rationale: Lists the ordered actions for preparing individual organoids for downstream experiments.
